document_data.name: Blackberry
document_data.mainbody: '''Blackberries''' were a common type of wild berry in the Realms, closely related to the [[dewberry]].
document_data.Habitats:
Places in the Realms where blackberries were known to grow included:
* [[Cormyr]]
* [[Dalelands]],
* [[The Vast]]
* [[Kozakura]], such as on the island of [[Miyashima]].{{Cite dungeon/33/Mad Gyoji|66}}
* [[Unapproachable East]], throughout the nation of [[Aglarond]].
document_data.History: The existence of blackberries on [[Toril]] dated all the way back to the days of [[Netheril]].
